          <title>
            <string language="en">Planets revolving around the Sun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Planeten, die um die Sonne rotieren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Planètes tournant autour du soleil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planetas que revolvem em torno do sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pianeti che girano intorno al sole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πλανήτες που περιστρέφονται γύρω από τον ήλιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Planetas que giran alrededor del sol</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that planets revolve around the Sun along their orbits.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Orbits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Planets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">revolution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Planeten um die Sonne
entlang ihren Bahnen rotieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que les planètes 
tournent autour du soleil le long de leurs orbites.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que os planetas revolvem
em torno do sol ao longo de suas órbitas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che i pianeti girano 
intorno al sole lungo le loro orbite.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι οι πλανήτες 
περιστρέφονται γύρω από τον ήλιο κατά μήκος των τροχιών τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que los planetas giran 
alrededor del sol a lo largo de sus órbitas.</string>
          </description>
